pkgmetadata.longdescription: Panda3D is a 3D engine: a library of subroutines for 3D rendering and game development. The library is C++ with a set of Python bindings. Game development with Panda3D usually consists of writing a Python program that controls the the Panda3D library.

use.flag: Enables support for using mod files for audio support
Enables support for the Netscape Portable Runtime, used in network interface functionality (ie. multiplayer online game networking).
